name: Best Instant Ramen Recipe
description: This is the best instant ramen recipe, featuring healthy vegetables and customizable spicy noodles, all unified by a delicious stir-fry sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by boiling your ramen noodles according to the package instructions. Once cooked, drain the noodles and set them aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Begin by boiling your ramen noodles according to the package instructions. Once cooked, drain the noodles and set them aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan or wok, heat oil over medium heat. Add chopped garlic to the oil, sautéing until it is fragrant and golden.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan or wok, heat oil over medium heat. Add chopped garlic to the oil, sautéing until it is fragrant and golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ground pork to the pan with the sautéed garlic. Break the meat apart with a spatula and cook until it’s no longer pink and starts to brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ground pork to the pan with the sautéed garlic. Break the meat apart with a spatula and cook until it’s no longer pink and starts to brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the pork is cooked, add sliced onions and carrots to the pan. Stir-fry the mixture until the vegetables are just tender to your liking.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the pork is cooked, add sliced onions and carrots to the pan. Stir-fry the mixture until the vegetables are just tender to your liking.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the previously cooked ramen noodles to the pan along with the stir-fry sauces and seasonings – white sugar, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, and oyster sauce. Toss everything together to combine, ensuring that the noodles get well-coated with the cooking juices and sauces.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the previously cooked ramen noodles to the pan along with the stir-fry sauces and seasonings – white sugar, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, and oyster sauce. Toss everything together to combine, ensuring that the noodles get well-coated with the cooking juices and sauces.

recipeInstructions.text: Finish by sprinkling white sesame seeds and freshly chopped green onions over the noodles. Serve immediately and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Finish by sprinkling white sesame seeds and freshly chopped green onions over the noodles. Serve immediately and enjoy!

review.reviewBody: Lively recipe easy very good, I give 5 stars

keywords: fried ramen, instant ramen, ramen noodles, ramen stir fry
